name: Schwomp the King Krab, a tale of schwompening (bige brod)
name_original: Schwomp the King Krab, a tale of schwompening (bige brod)
description: This is a fishing game without a fishing pole. The goal of the game is to get revenge on King Krab for schwomping the village. Eat fish to grow your neck and eventually go head on head with the big boy himself.
